values:
Get out of my head
Sounds good...
I didnt think it would be this hard.
Come on...you are one of the most intelligent women I know..I should be a stepping stone to what you don't even know you want yet
You will never be a stepping stone. For anyone. You were everything i wanted before i knew it already. There are so many things i wish i could say...
I never would have betrayed you.
That was never a question to me
Go have a GT
Already had a couple.
Good girl!
I wanted to make the hurt go away, but it didn't help. I dont understand why it hurts so much...
Because you are not rational looking at it...take feelings out...take a step back and look
I see the fact that a good girlifriend sticks by her boyfriend, even through the shitty parts.
I understand why you ended it, and as much as i hate to admit it your reasons are valid. I just miss having you to look forward to.
That's just it..you haven't seen Shitty yet...never let someone put their work first..I am and always will...but my daughter will be taught to never settle and I would be settling
You would be settling? You are by far the best man I've ever been with. I was not settling. The Corps always comes first.
And when you said maybe we could try again later...was that just lip service?
NO...just now with my sched there is no reason anyone should wait
Then the only thing that's changed is the title.
???
I'm not your girlfriend, but either way I wait.
To be blunt....that is just stoooopid! That is not you
Then you dont know me as well as you think you do.
Never wait never settle...listen to me...
I didn't settle for you. As someone who is looking to join the Corps, I may one day ask someone else to wait. I have no problem waiting for the things I value.
Our last kiss tasted like peaches.

When things in your lives seem almost too much to handle, when 24 hours in a day are not enough, remember the mayonnaise jar and the 2 cups of coffee.

A professor stood before his philosophy class and had some items in front of him. When the class began, he wordlessly picked up a very large and empty mayonnaise jar and proceeded to fill it with golf balls.

He then asked the students if the jar was full. They agreed that it was.

The professor then picked up a box of pebbles and poured them into the jar. He shook the jar lightly. The pebbles rolled into the open areas between the golf balls.

He then asked the students again if the jar was full. They agreed it was.

The professor next picked up a box of sand and poured it into the jar. Of course, the sand filled up everything else.

He asked once more if the jar was full. The students responded with an unanimous 'yes.'

The professor then produced two cups of coffee from under the table and poured the entire contents into the jar effectively filling the empty space between the sand. The students laughed.

"Now,' said the professor as the laughter subsided, 'I want you to recognize that this jar represents your life. The golf balls are the important things - your family, your children, your health, your friends and your favourite passions and if everything else was lost and only they remained, your life would still be full.

The pebbles are the other things that matter like your job, your house and your car.

The sand is everything else, the small stuff. 'If you put the sand into the jar first,' he continued, 'there is no room for the pebbles or the golf balls. The same goes for life. If you spend all your time and energy on the small stuff you will never have room for the things that are important to you.

'Pay attention to the things that are critical to your happiness. Play with your children. Take time to get medical checkups. Take your spouse out to dinner. Play another 18. There will always be time to clean the house and fix the disposal. Take care of the golf balls first, the things that really matter. Set your priorities. The rest is just sand.'

One of the students raised her hand and inquired what the coffeerepresented. The professor smiled. 'I'm glad you asked.

It just goes to show you that no matter how full your life may seem,there's always room for a couple of cups of coffee with a friend.'
And three shots of whiskey on an empty stomach later I really want a cigarette...among other things.

brad really needs to stop calling and being adorable over the phone. seriously. i mean i can blame myself for being an idiot and calling him at midnight to wish him a happy new year, but for fuck's sake, he's the one who says shit like, 'i like you, i like you a lot. i'm not gonna say i love you, but i like you,' or 'i like you, do you like me? tell me you like me i want to hear you say it,' or 'we're gonna hang out this weekend, what do you wanna do? we've already been to parties, i'm talking about a date here.' 

sonofafuckingdrunkassmonkey.

A Ranger, Marine and Sailor walk into a bar and each order a beer. At that very moment, three flies buzzing around the bar see the beer and one lands in each glass.

The Sailor gags and pushes his glass away.

The Marine shrugs, pulls the fly out of the glass and takes a drink.

The Ranger grabs his fly by the wings, flips him upside down and roars "SPIT IT OUT YOU FUCKING BASTARD!!"

I'm bored. I'm broke. I'm bummed because I can't really get anyone anything for Christmas this year... not to mention the fact that I can't quite get the Ranger out of my head. He disappears for a little while now and then, but he always pops back up again. Everyone's had a friend that's fooled around with a guy or a girl and after a while they come to you and say, 'you know that girl I messed around with a couple times? Dude now she's totally in love with me.' And then you cringe sympathetically , give the guy a pat on the shoulder and thank god you're not in his shoes. Yeah, well I think I'm "that girl" in this situation. Sucks. Let's just say I'll be really rather surprised if I hear from him any time soon. Eh. I guess that's one way to solve a problem. :P
i need a vacation from life. Who's comin' with me?

Two finals down, one to go. Five hours of the quarter left. I will kill the thrice damned Philosophy final, work up a sweat at the gym and then proceed to get absolutely fucking trashed. Hoo-rah. 

By the way, Band of Brothers is absolutely the greatest mini series ever created. I love military movies. More than football movies. And that's saying something.

I have succumbed. I have a therapist. His name is Ricardo Hidalgo and he dances in his chair. Or something. He has two pairs of spectacles that he alternates between when looking from his computer to me. No couch. No clipboard. Nice view of Lake Washington, though. "Tell me about your childhood." Apparenly I have "arbitrarily attached your self-worth to your desire for physical contact." Huh.
I am so unhappy. I need to get over this bullshit.

you know, i think i about hit rock bottom last night. i've never felt so hopelessly miserable in my life. i mean it wasn't just about brad, although i'm sure that had a lot to do with it. i just suddenly felt totally disillusioned with everything i was doing, with school, with my stupid ass job, with the fact that i'm not really doing anything with my self or my life. i talked to my mom for a long, long time and she was totally horrified by how desperately depressed i sounded over the phone. it apparently kept her up all night. and then my dad called because she of course called him to tell him i was so upset, and i talked to him for a long time, too. i think i just needed to get whatever that was out of my system.

and i feel better today. i mean this morning was still a little rocky, but now i'm actually in a rather cheerful mood, despite the fact that i have to write a 5 page paper on the rights of children to education vs the right of parents to teach their children as they see fit (ie indoctrinating children with certain religious beliefs/cultural attitudes). yeah, it's pretty much total bullshit, but that's what i do, apparently. i'm going to come out of the UW with a double degree in bullshit and a minor in classical studies (read: ancient bullshit). so awesome. yeah i thought so, too. 

oh good, the sardonic part of my personality has come back. this is a good sign. 

yay.

i should know by now that if i like a guy i should run the other way. i never meant for this to go so far. i thought, hey i'll never see this guy again or hear from him, so why not have a little fun? but then he had to call me, and then call me again, and then come see me again and the fakey little defenses i had blew over like the straw men that they were. i thought, well look at this, this guy actually likes me. he comes all the way up from ft lewis to see me. how can i not like him? and now i can't go three minutes without thinking about him. i just manage to ignore the fact that he's never come up specifically to see me, no matter how many times he says he will when he calls me up drunk. he might tell me how much he wants me over the phone, or when he's lying beside me, but i should know better than to let myself believe him, of all times, then. yeah, so maybe he really does like me, but then again, i can't imagine you'd keep going to sleep with a girl you didnt like at least a little bit. 

i hate that i'm such a fucking girl but i need to talk to him about this. he needs to know how hard this is for me. i need to apologize for making things so damned complicated when they could have been simple and fun. damn my feelings for getting in the way. i'll still care about him, and i'll still hope he's ok when he's off to where ever they send him, i'll still want to write to him and want to be there for him when he gets home, but what i want isnt what's important. the ball is in his court. its what he wants, what he is willing to try, that is important now. 

sometimes i really hate myself.

STOP TORTURING ME! For the love of god, please, stop telling me how much you like me, how much you wish we could be together more, how badly you want me. Stop being so cute on the phone. Stop making me feel like you care about me. Stop telling me you're going to come see me when you call me up drunk in the middle of the night, that you want me to meet you half way in Tacoma so we can have dinner, that you want me to get home from work this weekend to find you waiting at home for me. Stop making me love you. Please. You can't imagine how much this hurts. You say that you want to be with me, and with the next breath tell me that I want you to be something you can't be. Because you're always gone. Because you have to go to Iraq. Because we could only see each other on weekends. Becausebecausebecause... I don't care. I want to be with you. I want to be there for you when you get back from wherever it is you have to go. I want to be something stable, something warm, something you can count on. But what I want isnt good enough, because you have to want it, too. I could handle the phone calls and the admitions if only you just made up your mind and told me straight out that you didnt want anything more. Either let me let you go, or pull me closer, but as it stands now I'm having an extraordinarily hard time coping with your waffling.

brad came up again saturday night, and i'd just like to officially welcome myself back to being nothing more than a glorfied sex toy. way to go, ari, you sure know how to pick em. and yet i still care about him. a lot. 

well, it'll pass. it always does. you'd think by now i'd be really good at brushing this shit off, but it never gets any easier. this hurts more than it ever did before. this might take a while to get over. sonofabitch.

I am exhausted. Clearly I haven't been getting enough sleep, on top of which I've been adding a ton of unnecessary stress and anxiety. Drained doesn't even begin to cover how I feel. I think I could sleep for a fucking week. Fortunately, or unfortunately, I'm going to a show down in Portland Friday night, which should be totally awesome. It only means that I won't be getting any sleep this weekend, or at least not Friday night. Hmm... I need to find myself a sleeping bag... I mean the couch I was offered has since turned into a cozy spot on the floor because the awesome girls I'll be staying with are unexpectedly moving. It'll be interesting. Worst comes to worst I'll sleep three hours on the train back home. Weee.

i miss you so much. it's never hurt like this before. i need to know where you stand. it's too late to keep myself from getting attached, but i can at least start to let go if i know for certain that there is nothing here for me. i can let go of that hope that you actually care about me, too. but i can't let go of you, even if i feel deep down that you want nothing more from me than what you've already gotten. i feel cheap, helpless and alone; i feel like a part of me is missing. all i want is for someone to care about me in return, for once in my life... why can't it be you?

<DoctorRiff> well anyway, this drill sarge gets everyone lined up, and starts yelling at all the recruits, like how they do
<DoctorRiff> and he was over to the left of the line, when someone way off in the right yells "GIVE ME LIBERTY OR GIVE ME DEATH!"
<DoctorRiff> and the drill sarge yells "WHO SAID THAT?!" and goes over and starts yelling at the right of the line
<DoctorRiff> then someone at the left of the line says "PATRICK HENRY YOU FOOL!"
<DoctorRiff> according to my dad's friend, it was worth all the extra jogging and military-type training they had to do



That brings joy to my heart. I can't wipe this shit eating grin off my face. Damn that feels good.

So I went in for a trim today, and I told the guy, I want it pretty much the same, just take off like half an inch and give me back my bangs. But noooo, he decided to chop it all!!! Ok, slight exageration, but come on! I look so much better with longer hair.... *sniff*

Before:
      

After:




I mean it'll grow back, but fuck, man. Goddamnit.

I haven't done anything productive for three and a half weeks. Damn. This is not a happy trend. I have, however, hit upon one of those rare artistic inspirations, which is good, even if it means I'll get even less done (fuck me and my astronomy midterm Thursday, ugh). I've been playing with black ink for the last two hours. It's messy. I like messy. I also played football for the first time in three weeks, and it made me so happy. I am a fucking awesome quarterback...when there is no blitz... *cough*

Speaking of football, Seahawks, what the bloody fuck? Pittsburg was one thing, but Cleveland? Really? Come on.

That is all.

You may be feeling better now that the Moon is in your 11th House of Friends. This can refresh your dreams and open your visions of the future to bring new opportunities into your life. Nevertheless, you are still sinking into deeper feelings. Build on what you have already begun in order to make it more solid.  


I went to the gym today for the first time in aaaages and I feel amaaaazing. God I am such an endorphin addict. I probably shouldn't have gone, seeing as how I've had mono for, what, a week and a half? I'm supposed to wait a month before I do any sort of intense physical activity (contact sports, heavy lifting) because my spleen might explode, but I decided to take the 'fuck it' approach. G.E.N.I.U.S.

you know, it's amazing how much for granted you take the outdoors when you can go jump around outside whenever you want. i miss hiking, something i haven't done for far too long, i miss biking down trails and wandering around the forest wading through rivers and streams looking for waterfalls. i miss sitting on a bolder on some mountainside somewhere with a crappy sandwich and a bottle of water enjoying the breeze on my face. hell, i even miss falling on my ass all over the place when i go snowboarding. i wish i was better at that... snowboarding that is, not falling on my ass. i'm plenty good at that as it is. :P

college has kind of taken the outdoors away from me. i mean i wasn't ever that kid who went hiking every weekend or went camping for weeks at a time, but i still miss it. i even miss fishing. i'd do just about anything to find myself out on some lake in the mountains somewhere, bundled up in a sleeping bag in front of a fire with nothing around  me but the trees and the sky and the wild. fuck school, fuck responsibility, fuck people and fuck being sick. i miss my mountain.

everyone on my floor is going out, so i'm stuck here alone, tired, and bored out of my mind. i mean i suppose i could just go to sleep, but i want  to do something, you know? i called brad and we talked for a few awkward choppy minutes before i finally gave up and let him go back to being bored himself. fucking awesome, i know. now i'm just...antsy. i don't have any friends nearby that i could call to come hang out either. andrew's probably off doing something andrew-y, i'm don't have enough energy to be around amy for long periods of time, i can't even pretend jordan is even an option anymore, even just to hang out...fuck what the hell am i going to do? it's 8 fucking in the pm. goddamn this. i don't have anything better to do than update this stupid thing with depressed posts all the damn time. seriously, i never have anything good to say. fuck. this blows. 

EDIT: whoa the melodrama. take a pill, me, you do have a shit ton of vicodin... lol.
i can't seem to get out of this cycle... fuck.

You know, I just love chance meetings. They say the best things are unexpected, and I'd have to agree with them, whoever they may be. Here's hoping things will continue to look up. Fuck hope, things are gonna keep looking up. That's it. End of story. Period. Because I say so. Ha.

...yeah...

I watched Jarhead tonight. That was a bad call on my part. Don't get me wrong, it's a great movie, but it's really upsetting, and considering recent events it's even more upsetting now than it was when I watched it, oh, eight months ago, or something like that. This is my rifle, there are many like it, but this one is mine. Without my rifle I am nothing. Without me my rifle is nothing. Christ, I can't get that out of my head. Awesome.

Oh, and here's to parents who aren't sheltered as fuck and don't blow shit way out of proportion and give their kids a hard time about it when they've got mono. Seriously, my parents are awesome, but fuck man, leave me the fuck alone. I'm not an alcoholic and I'm not a cheap whore, so fucking shut the fuck up already. Shite.

i'm tired. i'm miss brad. i'm waiting for the vicodin to kick in and make me an emotional mess. awesome.

i hate you, mononucleosis.

So brief recap on the last few weeks. My birthday was a disaster. I fell for Jordan and told him so, also a disaster, in fact, any interaction we have, of any kind, inevitably leads to disaster. I've been drinking too much. I've been depressed. I meet Brad and everything is suddenly ok, whether or not anything comes of it. At least I finally got out of the asshole rut. Great. Peaches. Wonderful. Marvelous. And other such words as well. This morning I wake up feeling like I'm about to die. I go to Hall Health and discover that I don't have Strep like I originally thought, oh no, they did me one better. I have fucking Mono. MONO! I have midterms next week. I can't even stand without wavering. How the hell am I going to be able to take my fucking exams! 

And on top of that I have to call Brad and tell him that while he probably didn't get it from me because it's not really infectious until the fever symptoms appear and I didnt get those until this afternoon, he should still be on the look-out. Good thing he has an horrific physical exam in the next few weeks. Good thing he has to run 5 miles in under 30 minutes, climb a rope, run 12 miles in under an hour and a half in full armor with all his weaponry, etc etc etc. Good thing he decided to sleep with a girl who had FUCKING MONO! Christ, he'll probably hate me now. I didn't even know I had it. I feel horrible. I wish I'd known. I'll be so unhappy if I fucked shit up for him. He doesn't deserve that. Goddamn the world to hell. I am so fucking miserable.

Now I just have to sit here and wait for the Vicodin to kick in. I am such a mess.

I'm coming down with what feels like STREP and I'm so not happy about it, it's not even funny. What extraordinarily bad timing. It's the week before midterms, the week before Halloween, and my tonsils are so swollen and painful I'm having a hard time swallowing water. What. The. Fuck. 

I guess that's what I get for not sleeping enough, drinking too much, but not enough water, walking around late at night in the rain and just in general being a complete fool and putting myself under extreme psychological stress. Yeah, that'll do it. Mother. Fucker.
i just bought my train ticket for the 16th. fuck yeah.

I've decided that I'm going to hop a train and go see Amadan down in Portland on November 16th and on New Year's Eve. I don't give a shit, I want to go, and so I'm fucking going. Damnit. I'll probably need a diversion by the 16th anyway, seeing the way things have been going with life in general, the Seahawks, school, drama... lord all mighty, what the fuck were you thinking when you made people so fucking stupid? Fuck your mom, and i can say that because, in effect, you are your mom, which means that what I really mean when I say 'fuck your mom,' god, is fuck you.

I've just jinxed myself for the rest of eternity. See if I fucking care. I wont even notice a fucking difference.

i guess this is one of those moments when i have to decide whether i want to let go of something that hurts, or to just let it keep tearing away at me. there is no one to blame in this situation but me, seeing as how i let myself get tripped up despite understanding that there was no point in stopping to see if there was anything there. must have been the fact that despite your tendancy to be a real asshole, there's something good and worthwile underneath it all.

i've decided that this game is like a really fucked up version of rugby. no one tells you the rules, or even the point of the game, you just run around blindly, wracking up penalties, until you start to figure shit out. i quit playing rugby after two weeks when i realized that my body was no longer able to function properly due to the constant, violent abuse it was sustaining. i'm starting to wonder if i'm not subjecting myself to a similar kind of brutalization, emotionally rather than physically, in this new and equaly ridiculous game.

i'm sorry i couldn't be what you wanted, but the cards are on the table and there's no point in dwelling on the past. i hope you find what you're looking for.

1. My punk rock Halloween costume is awesome and will only get more amazing. Tiny skirts, fishnets and Doc Martens suit me.
2. I am a complete and total idiot. Stupid, stupid, stupid fucking idiot.
3. IDIOT.

i staid up until 4am last night helping jordan with his homework, and now i kind of want to curl up and die. the football game was a success, i feel, despite the loss. but i've managed to fuck up my anterior hip flexors (those litle muscles that connect your upper quad to the muscles around our pelvis), one more than the other so I've got this awesome limp going, my back and right obliques are uncomfortably tight, i forgot my waterbottle at home (ah dehydration), and i'm so tired that i'm starting to get dizzy. hurray for 4ish hours of sleep after a brutal football game, especially when the night before i only got 5 or 6. 

nothing productive will happen today. thats what todays horoscope should have said, not the stupid: helping people could help you, expect a phone call, good karma blah blah blah. i hate your lies, horoscope. lies i tell you.

p.s. this little mac navigation rollerball thing on the top of my mouse is making me crazy. its like the size of a small ball bearing and it's just so...so....damned.....mac-y.
Dude, guys.... tomorrow's my birthday... Yeah 21!!1!

ye gods it doth amaze me.

"aren't we clever"? you piece of rat shit. you fail at life. you go back to school, only to fuck yourself in the ass with your own over-inflated ego. you think you're entitled to my time and energy? fuck you. you think i should pretend like you really arent the arrogant shit you throw at people, and ignore how pathetic you are for hiding the fact that you really are a sad, sensitive, intelligent little boy? what the fuck is wrong with you? grow a goddamn spine and stop trying to tear me down to your miserable level. 

oh that i were a spartan. i dont care how fucked up they were, i dont give a rats ass how harshly they lived, they knew what was up. seriously.

Things aren't really working out like I'd hoped. No surprise there. I think I'm setting myself up for disaster.

I've been in school for half a week, and I'm already wishing it was summertime again. Things are always so much less complicated and a thousand times more care-free in the summer. 

I hate feeling lonely.

i hate this job. i hate waking up at 6 only to spend the next eight and a half hours lifting heavy furniture for a couple of incompitent managers with nothing better to do than stick their thumbs in their asses and be moronic. i hate that i'm stupid when it comes to boys. i hate that i don't know the rules of the game, that i don't have the same social boundries as everybody else, that i'm never prepared for anything. i hate that i called him the next day. god what an idiot. now not only do i probably come off as incredibly easy, but clingy and/or needy as well. i really liked him. maybe i'll call him again tomorrow, just to verify. that'll have been four days, that's not weird is it? i mean he said he really wanted me to call him... fuck. way to go ari, way to be a total prat.

i am utterly exhausted. i need a tiny asian woman to walk on my back.

damnit, i think i'm beginning to like him. what the fuck.


lame.
Fuck you, body. Of all the things you could hae possibly come up with to have go wrong, you had to come up with that? Seriously? Son of a bitch. I am not a fan.

I feel for the first time utterly dismissed. The last vestiges of affective hope have finally vanished, leaving me once again where I was when it all began: I have nothing to desire, no one to long for, not a single reason to be anything more than myself. Tomorrow will be a mistake that much I am sure of, but it is too late to prevent it now. I thought maybe things would be different, or maybe that they would be the same. Now it seems that things will be neither... or perhaps both. I am a hollow vessel, the emptiness within me exagerated now that what once filled me has gone. He pushes the hours forward as if to say the sooner we get started, the sooner we will be done. I am left wondering if I should go at all, knowing that I should not, but wanting the company of someone who was once so close, even if we are no longer. I wonder if maybe I'm just not capable of true closeness, if perhaps I will forever keep people at a distance, afraid of dependence, afraid of being vulnerable, afraid that what is behind all my defenses and facades isn't worth the effort of overcoming them.

I want to be like Steve McQueen. I wish I could be who I am without having to be apologetic. I wish I didn't care what other people thought of me. Something new to learn, perhaps...
